domains.name: Algebra
domains.description: The study of mathematical symbols and the rules for manipulating them. From simple equations to abstract structures like groups and rings.
domains.flavor: The Golden Galaxy — where symbols dance and equations sing. Every mathematician's journey begins here.

domains.name: Analysis
domains.description: The rigorous study of limits, continuity, derivatives, integrals, and infinite series. The mathematics of change and approximation.
domains.flavor: The Blue Nebula — an infinite ocean of curves, converging and diverging in beautiful patterns.

domains.name: Geometry
domains.description: The study of shapes, sizes, positions, and properties of space. From Euclidean planes to curved manifolds.
domains.flavor: The Emerald Cluster — a crystalline realm where shapes and spaces reveal their hidden symmetries.

domains.name: Number Theory
domains.description: The queen of mathematics. The study of integers, primes, divisibility, and the deep patterns hidden in numbers.
domains.flavor: The Rose Spiral — ancient and mysterious, its prime stars are scattered in patterns no one fully understands.
